definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: incise, scratch (NH id., so Aram. [[סְרַט]] Pa (Targum 1Sa 21:14), srat., sret. scratch, hence write (= xara/ssw); As. šarâṭu, slit up, rend; Ar. 4arat.a slit ear of camel, 4art.un, 4arat.un sign, mark (RS:K 214 f.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. c. acc. cogn. [[וּבִבְשָׂרָם לאׁ יִשְׂרְטוּ שָׂרָָטֶת]] Le 21:5 shall make no incision; Inf. abs. c.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[שָׂרוֹט]] [[יִשָּׂרֵָטוּ]] Zec 12:3 those loaded with the stone shall be severely scratched, lacerated.
